allow: Bash(psql "$VITE_SUPABASE_URL" -c "SELECT u.email, up.role, up.primary_role_id, r.name as role_name, r.display_name, r.level FROM auth.users u LEFT JOIN user_profiles up ON u.id = up.id LEFT JOIN roles r ON up.primary_role_id = r.id WHERE u.email = (SELECT email FROM auth.users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1);")
